flavor.reason: The dishes are praised for their exceptional and creative flavors, with many standout options.

freshness.reason: The restaurant uses high-quality, fresh ingredients, evident in the vibrant flavors of the dishes.

service.reason: Service is generally attentive and professional, though some inconsistencies were noted.

environment.reason: The ambiance is sophisticated and intimate, though it can feel cramped and noisy at times.

value.reason: While the food quality is high, small portions and higher prices affect the perceived value.
